Getting started

```{r}
packages = c('ggstatsplot', 'ggside', 'knitr',
             'tidyverse', 'broom', 'ggdist',
             'ungeviz', 'gganimate', 'sf', 'tmap')
for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
}
```
